sql.if: and( upper(to_char(eio.dt_work, 'YYYY-MM-DD DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN')) like upper('%${keyword1}%') or upper(eio.emp_no) like upper('%${keyword1}%') or upper((select e.emp_name from employee e where eio.emp_no = e.emp_no)) like upper('%${keyword1}%') or upper((select d.dep_name from dept d, employee e where e.emp_no = eio.emp_no and d.dep_no = e.dep_no)) like upper('%${keyword1}%') or upper((select j.jikup from code_jikup j, employee e where e.jikup_cd = j.jikup_cd and e.emp_no = eio.emp_no)) like upper('%${keyword1}%') or upper(to_char(eio.in_time, 'HH24:MI')) like upper('%${keyword1}%') or upper(to_char(eio.out_time, 'HH24:MI')) like upper('%${keyword1}%') or upper( to_number(to_char(eio.out_time, 'HH24')) - to_number( to_char(eio.in_time, 'HH24')) ) like upper('%${keyword1}%') or upper( (select check_inout_name from code_check_inout where eio.check_inout_cd = check_inout_cd) ) like upper('%${keyword1}%') or upper(eio.remarks) like upper('%${keyword1}%') )
and (select check_inout_name from code_check_inout where eio.check_inout_cd = check_inout_cd)=#{inout_name}

and ( upper(emp_name) like upper('%${searchKeyword}%') or upper(emp_eng_name) like upper('%${searchKeyword}%') or upper((select d.dep_name from dept d where d.dep_no=e.dep_no)) like upper('%${searchKeyword}%') or upper((select j.jikup from code_jikup j where j.jikup_cd=e.jikup_cd)) like upper('%${searchKeyword}%') )

mapper.select: select count(*) from employee e where 1=1

select * from(select zzz.*, rownum RNUM from( select e.emp_no "emp_no", (select j.jikup from code_jikup j where j.jikup_cd = (select ee.jikup_cd from employee ee where ee.emp_no=e.emp_no) ) "jikup", e.emp_name "emp_name", trunc(e.salary/12, 5) "salary", (select 100000 from dual) "sikdae", (select extract(year from sysdate) from dual) "year", (select extract(month from sysdate) from dual) "month" from employee e where 1=1 order by e.emp_no asc ) zzz ) where RNUM>=${selectPageNo*rowCntPerPage-rowCntPerPage+1} and RNUM<=${selectPageNo*rowCntPerPage}

select (select e.emp_name from employee e where e.emp_no = #{emp_no}) "emp_name", (select j.jikup from code_jikup j where j.jikup_cd = (select e.jikup_cd from employee e where e.emp_no=#{emp_no}) ) "jikup", (select trunc(e.salary/12, 5) from employee e where e.emp_no = #{emp_no}) "salary", to_char(sop.salary_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "salary_dt", sop.real_sal ||'' "real_sal" from state_of_payment sop where 1=1 and sop.emp_no = #{emp_no}
select (select c.jikup from code_jikup c where c.jikup_cd = e.jikup_cd) "jikup", trunc(avg(salary), 1) "avg_salary" from employee e group by e.jikup_cd order by e.jikup_cd
select extract(year from sysdate) as "now_year", extract(month from sysdate) as "now_month" from dual
select count(*) from emp_dayoff where 1=1 and (end_day_off >= sysdate)

select * from (select zzz.*, rownum RNUM from( select ed.emp_no as "emp_no" ,(select d.dep_name from dept d, employee e where ed.emp_no = e.emp_no and d.dep_no = e.dep_no) as "dep_name" ,(select j.jikup from code_jikup j, employee e where e.jikup_cd = j.jikup_cd and e.emp_no = ed.emp_no) as "jikup" ,(select e.emp_name from employee e where ed.emp_no = e.emp_no) as "emp_name" ,(select cd.dayoff_name from code_dayoff cd where ed.dayoff_cd = cd.dayoff_cd ) as "dayoff_name" ,to_char(ed.start_day_off, 'YYYY-MM-DD DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') as "start_day_off" ,to_char(ed.end_day_off, 'YYYY-MM-DD DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') as "end_day_off" from emp_dayoff ed where 1=1 and (ed.end_day_off >= sysdate) ) zzz ) where RNUM >= ${selectPageNo * rowCntPerPage - rowCntPerPage + 1} and RNUM <= ${selectPageNo * rowCntPerPage}
select count(*) from emp_inout eio where 1=1

select * from (select zzz.*, rownum RNUM from( select to_char(eio.dt_work, 'YYYY-MM-DD DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') as "DT_WORK" ,eio.emp_no||'' as "EMP_NO" ,(select e.emp_name from employee e where eio.emp_no = e.emp_no) as "EMP_NAME" ,(select d.dep_name from dept d, employee e where e.emp_no = eio.emp_no and d.dep_no = e.dep_no) as "DEP_NAME" ,(select j.jikup from code_jikup j, employee e where e.jikup_cd = j.jikup_cd and e.emp_no = eio.emp_no) as "JIKUP" ,to_char(eio.in_time, 'HH24:MI') as "IN_TIME" ,to_char(eio.out_time, 'HH24:MI') as "OUT_TIME" ,to_number( to_char(eio.out_time, 'HH24')) - to_number( to_char(eio.in_time, 'HH24') )||' 시간' as "WORKING_HRS" ,(select check_inout_name from code_check_inout where eio.check_inout_cd = check_inout_cd) as "CHECK_INOUT_NAME" ,eio.remarks as "REMARKS" from emp_inout eio where 1=1 order by eio.dt_work ) zzz ) where RNUM >= ${selectPageNo * rowCntPerPage - rowCntPerPage + 1} and RNUM <= ${selectPageNo * rowCntPerPage}

select emp_no as "emp_no" ,emp_name as "emp_name" ,emp_eng_name as "emp_eng_name" ,jumin_num as "jumin_num" ,phone as "phone" ,emp_email as "emp_email" ,emp_email_office as "emp_email_office" ,emp_addr as "emp_addr" ,hire_dt as "hire_dt" ,is_on_leave as "is_on_leave" ,emp_gender as "emp_gender" ,salary as "salary" ,emp_pic as "emp_pic" ,(select d.dep_name from dept d where e1.dep_no=d.dep_no) as "dep_name" ,(select w.worktime_name from code_worktime w where e1.worktime_cd=w.worktime_cd) as "worktime_name" ,(select j.jikup from code_jikup j where j.jikup_cd=e1.jikup_cd) as "jikup" ,(select jikup from code_jikup where jikup_cd=(select jikup_cd from employee where emp_no=(select mgr_emp_no from employee where emp_no=#{emp_no}))) as "mgr_emp_jikup" ,(select dep_name from dept where dep_no=(select dep_no from employee where emp_no=(select mgr_emp_no from employee where emp_no=#{emp_no}))) as "mgr_emp_dep_name" ,(select e2.emp_name from employee e2 where e2.emp_no=e1.mgr_emp_no) as "mgr_emp_name" from employee e1 where 1=1 and emp_no=#{emp_no}
mapper.update: update emp_dayoff set dayoff_cd=to_number(#{dayoff_cd}) ,start_day_off = to_date(#{start_day_off},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,end_day_off = to_date(#{end_day_off},'YYYY-MM-DD') where emp_no = to_number(#{emp_no})
